cards.rules_text:
When Bygone Mariner enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard three cards.
{5}: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of that card except it has decayed and “Tap this creature: Target artifact you control named Bygone Mariner becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.”

Whenever Imperial Butterfly attacks, draw a card.
Whenever an opponent deals combat damage to you, that player gains control of Imperial Butterfly.
Crew 1

Menace
Whenever [i]H.S.S. Dreadnought[/i] attacks, put a vengeance counter on it, then defending player sacrifices a permanent for each vengeance counter on [i]H.S.S. Dreadnought[/i].
Crew 2

Flying
When [i]Draco Ligneus[/i] enters the battlefield or attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. When you don't, [i]Draco Ligneus[/i] deals 3 damage to up to one target creature, planeswalker, or battle.
Crew 3

Whenever The[i] Fell Reaper[/i] enters the battlefield or attacks, search your library for a Curse card that doesn't share a name with a Curse attached to target opponent and put it onto the battlefield attached to that player, then shuffle.
You may tap an untapped planeswalker you control rather than pay The[i] Fell Reaper[/i]'s crew cost.
Crew 4

Whenever [i]The Moon and the Moors[/i] attacks, choose any number —
• Pay {W}. When you do, return another target nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand.
• Pay {2}{U}. When you do, return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Crew 2

Whenever [i]The Bones and the Brine[/i] attacks, choose any number —
• Pay {U}. When you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed.
• Pay {2}{B}. When you do, each player sacrifices a non-Vehicle creature.
Crew 2

Whenever [i]The Spite and the Scorn[/i] attacks, choose any number —
• Pay {B}. When you do, [i]The Spite and the Scorn[/i] deals 2 damage to defending player.
• Pay {2}{R}. When you do, [i]The Spite and the Scorn[/i] deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker defending player controls.
Crew 2

Whenever [i]The Storm and the Cedar[/i] attacks, choose any number —
• Pay {1}{R}. When you do, target creature can't block this turn.
• Pay {1}{G}. When you do, target creature you control must be blocked this combat if able.
Crew 2

Whenever [i]The Heart and the Soul[/i] attacks, choose any number —
• Pay {2}{G}. When you do, another target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
• Pay {1}{W}. When you do, another target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
Crew 2

Whenever [i]The Mirth and the Misery[/i] attacks, choose any number —
• Pay {W}. When you do, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
• Pay {B}. When you do, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Crew 2

Whenever [i]The Flesh and the Fate[/i] attacks, choose any number —
• Pay {B}. When you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Pay {G}. When you do, discard a creature card. If you do, search your library for a creature card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Crew 2

Whenever [i]The Earth and the Sea[/i] attacks, choose any number —
• Pay {G}. When you do, until end of turn, target land you control becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature that's attacking.
• Pay {U}. When you do, another target creature or land you control can't be blocked this turn.
Crew 2

Whenever [i]The Blood and the Claw[/i] attacks, choose any number —
• Pay {1}{U}. When you do, target creature defending player controls has base power and toughness 0/1 and loses all abilities until end of turn.
• Pay {2}{R}. When you do, target attacking creature you control has base power and toughness 4/4 and gains flying until end of turn.
Crew 2

Whenever [i]The Sun and the Spirit[/i] attacks, choose any number —
• Pay {1}{R}. When you do, create two 1/1 red Pirate creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. Exile them at end of combat.
• Pay {2}{W}. When you do, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Crew 2

{T}: Add {C}.
Crew 3 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Aye, she be seaworthy. The fleet will sail again one day, and she'll be sailin' right alongside ‘em.”
—Captain Huff Hogan[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever The[i] Great Maw[/i] attacks, you may pay {4}. If you do, create an 8/8 blue Kraken creature token that's tapped and attacking. That token gains trample and hexproof until end of turn, then exile The[i] Great Maw[/i] until that token leaves the battlefield.
Crew 2

Whenever [i]Suitor of the Wind[/i] attacks, you may pay {WU}{WU}. When you do, tap target noncreature artifact you control. Until end of combat, it becomes a 3/3 artifact creature that's attacking.
Crew 1

Whenever The [i]Foul Omen[/i] attacks, you may pay {UB}{UB}. When you do, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens with decayed.[i] [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
[/i]Crew 3

Whenever [i]Despair's Emissary[/i] attacks, you may pay {BR}{BR}. When you do, it deals damage equal to the number of enchantments you control to defending player.
Crew 2

Whenever [i]Shining Horizon[/i] attacks, you may pay {RG}{RG}. When you do, create two tapped Treasure tokens.
Crew 2

Whenever [i]Frere et Soeur[/i] attacks, you may pay {GW}{GW}. When you do, distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures and/or Vehicles you control.
Crew 2

Whenever The [i]Ashen Cross[/i] attacks, you may pay {WB}{WB}. When you do, return target creature card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, then sacrifice that creature.
Crew 3

Whenever The[i] Abyssal Pilgrim[/i] attacks, you may pay {BG}{BG}. When you do, mill three cards, then you may return a permanent card milled this way to your hand.
Crew 1

Whenever [i]Seaskipper[/i] attacks, you may pay {GU}{GU}. When you do, create a token that's a copy of target creature you control with mana value 3 or less.
Crew 2

Whenever The[i] Scarlet Scourge[/i] attacks, you may pay {UR}{UR}. When you do, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Sacrifice that token at end of combat.
Crew 2

Whenever The[i] Huntress[/i] attacks, you may pay {RW}{RW}. When you do and it's your first combat phase this turn, untap each attacking Vehicle you control. After this combat phase, there is an additional combat phase.
Crew 4

When Jolly Drifter enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue and red Pirate creature tokens.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Colossal Flagship can't be blocked by more than one creature.
Crew 5 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 5 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Trample
Whenever Wavewrecker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

When Relentless Destroyer enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

When Agile Catamaran enters the battlefield under your control, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Whenever Shipping Schooner attacks, draw a card, then discard a card.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

{3}: Skysail Cutter gains flying until end of turn.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Menace
Crew 3 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Royal Patroller can't be blocked by creatures with power 1 or less.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

{T}: Each opponent loses 1 life. Activate only if Sea Devil is a creature.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

When Blood Flag Convoy enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 colorless Vehicle artifact token with crew 1.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
